name: Animal Dodging - New GYMs
description:
Hello there,

We are glad you found this page. 

The game is about a fox who tried to defend her home gym from the crocodiles.

On her way to do so, she learns a lot of new skills and encounters new challenges to master. 

This game has been made for the Brackeys Game Jam and was our second Jam ever. Just as last time, it was a ton of fun but still brought us to the edge of failure. It was quite interesting to see how much we improved in half a year. But also again noticing some flaws, especially in the planning bits. But I guess this gets better and better with every game jam. 

For Heuerus, it was his first game jam, and it seems like we sparked his interest in creating things from scratch and doing everything by himself. 

We would of course appreciate your feedback on the game.

Have a great day, LeMixer Team and Heuerus
